page.title: 17Merebrow Village Institute.
page.content: In the centre of the village is the recently built village institute. This building is used for alsorts and types of things. It can be hired for public and private events. Held in the institute is a weekly dancing class where children learn dancing and tap. Each week there is a Youth Club on Mondays and an occasional Disco. Many other good activities take place. The institute is split up into two, a snooker room on side and the other side has a bar and is used for social functions. The W.I.meets monthly and an Autumn Club every Monday afternoon. The institute has a bowling green with floodlights. There are several bowling teams and many matches are played on the green.
